docs.title: FreeSurfer
docs.description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.
A tool for finding clusters in a volume, useful for analyzing MRI data.

docs.title: Output Cluster Number VolID
docs.description: Output volume ID with cluster number values.

docs.title: Pointset File
docs.description: Create a freeview pointset of the clusters.

docs.title: Sign
docs.description: Sign for one-sided tests (<abs>, pos, neg).

docs.title: No Adjust Flag
docs.description: Do not adjust threshold for one-tailed tests.

docs.title: CWP Value Threshold
docs.description: Require clusters to have cwp < threshold.

docs.title: FSaverage Space Flag
docs.description: Assume input is in fsaverage space.

docs.title: Frame Number
docs.description: Perform cluster analysis on the nth frame (0-based).

docs.title: Max CWPVal File
docs.description: Save p-value of the largest cluster.

docs.title: CSD PDF File
docs.description: PDF/CDF of cluster and max significance.

docs.title: CSD PDF Only Flag
docs.description: Write CSD PDF file and exit.

docs.title: FWHM Value
docs.description: FWHM in mm^3, forces GRF analysis.

docs.title: FWHM File
docs.description: Text file with FWHM in mm^3 for GRF.

docs.title: Minimum Size Voxels
docs.description: Minimum number of contiguous voxels for a cluster.

docs.title: GTE Flag
docs.description: Use >= when computing p-value from CSD.

docs.title: Mask Frame
docs.description: Nth frame of mask to use.

docs.title: Mask Sign
docs.description: Sign in mask thresholding (<abs>, neg, pos).

docs.title: Label File
docs.description: File to save nth cluster as a label.

docs.title: Nth Label Cluster
docs.description: Save the nth cluster as a label.

docs.title: Label Base
docs.description: Base name for saving clusters as labels.

docs.title: Synthesis Function
docs.description: Function for synthetic data (uniform, loguniform, gaussian).

docs.title: Fill Parameters
docs.description: Parameters for fill operation (invol outvol matchval).
A tool for finding clusters in a volume, useful for analyzing MRI data.
